document.docAuthor: Gadallah, Neveen S., Ghahari, Hassan & Peris-Felipo, Francisco Javier
document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of the Iranian Microgastrinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of the Iranian Microgastrinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution in Iran .
Golestan, Mazandaran (Ghahari et al. 2011 ), Iran (no locality cited) (
Aubert 1966
).

Distribution outside Iran .
Afghanistan , Armenia , Austria , Azerbaijan , Belgium , Bulgaria , China , Croatia , Czech Republic , Estonia , Finland , France , Georgia , Germany , Greece , Hungary , Ireland , Israel , Italy , Japan , Kazakhstan , Kyrgyzstan , Latvia , Lithuania , Macedonia , Moldova , Mongolia , Montenegro , Netherlands , Poland , Romania , Russia , Serbia , Slovakia , Spain , Sweden , Switzerland , Turkey , Turkmenistan , Ukraine , UK , Uzbekistan , former Yugoslavia (
Yu et al. 2012
).

Host records.
Orthosia gracilis
,
Xestia stigmatica
,
Leptidia sinapis
(
Shenefelt 1972
;
Yu et al. 2012
),
Cucullia absinthii
,
Dasychira pudibunda
,
Melitaea Aurelia
,
Phragmatobia fuliginosa (
Shenefelt 1972
)
. In Europe, it has been reported from
Clostera anastomosis
,
Acronicta rumicis
,
Catocala nupta
,
Cucullia asteris
,
Orthocia incerta
,
Diachrysia chrysitis
,
Autographa gamma
,
Lacanobia pisi
,
Noctua pronuba
,
N. fimbria , Xylina exoleta
(
Fahringer 1936
;
Yu et al. 2012
); in Japan , from
Mamestra brassicae
,
Xestia c-nigrum
(
Watanabe 1937
;
Yu et al. 2012
) and
Phytometra ornatissima (
Watanabe 1937
)
. Also, it has been reported from
Maniola jurtina
,
Pyronia tithonus
,
Anarta myrtilli
(
Nixon 1974
;
Yu et al. 2012
).
Yu et al. ( 2012 )
reported it from
Acrolyta nens
,
A. rufocincta
,
Acronicta aceris
,
A. euphorbiae
,
A. leporina
,
A. urticae
,
Agrotis clavis
,
A. segetum
,
Ancylis laetana
,
Antoculeora ornatissima
,
Aporia crataegi
,
Arctia tigrina
,
Bathythrix aerea
,
Bombyx mori
,
Callistege mi
,
Calliteara pudibunda
,
Catolaccus ater
,
Cerastis rubricosa
,
Chaetostomella cylindrica
,
Chersotis rectangula
,
Cucullia argentea
,
C. artemisiae
,
C. lucifuga
,
Dendrolimus pini
,
Diaphora mendica
,
Dibrachys cavus
,
D. microgastri
,
Discestra trifolii
,
Dyspessa ulula
,
Eriogaster lanestris
,
Eupithecia abbreviata
,
E. innitata
,
E. tripunctaria
,
Euproctis chrysorrhoea
,
Eupsilia transversa
,
Eurodryas aurinia
,
Euxoa temera
,
E. tritici
,
Gelis acarorum
,
G. agilis
,
G. anthracinus
,
G. cinctus
,
G. nigritulus
,
G. proximus
,
G. rufogaster
,
G. spurius
,
Graphiphora augur
,
Lacanobia oleracea
,
Loxostege sticticalis
,
Lymantria dispar
,
Lysibia nana
,
Mesochorus acuminatus
,
M. discitergus
,
M. fuscicornis
,
M. olerum
,
M. velox
,
Neochrysocharis albiscapus
,
Ocnogyna boetica
,
O . loewii
,
O . gothica
,
O . incerta
,
Ostrinia nubilalis
,
Pararge aegeria
,
Pegomya conformis
,
Pexicopia malvella
,
Phalera bucephala
,
Phigalia pilosaria
,
Pieris brassicae
,
Plebejus ( Plebejidea ) loewii
,
Plutella xylostella
,
Psychophagus omnivorus
,
Pteromalus microgastris
,
P. semotus
,
Pyrausta cingulata
,
P. purpuralis
,
P. sanguinalis
,
Spilosoma lubricipedum
,
Tortrix viridana
,
Vanessa indica
,
Xestia exoleta
,
X. triangulum
,
X. vetusta
,
Yponomeuta malinella
,
Zygaena filipendulae
. In former Czechoslovakia , it has been reported from
Eurois occulta
, while in Greece from
Aglais io
(
Tobias 1986
;
Yu et al. 2012
).
